instance_template: c(C) :- course(C,_,_,_,_,_). t(T) :- course(_,T,_,_,_,_). r(R) :- room(R,_,_). d(0..D-1) :- days(D). ppd(0..P-1) :- periods_per_day(P). cu(Cu) :- curricula(Cu,_).
generator: N { assigned(C,D,P) : d(D), ppd(P) } N :- course(C,_,N,_,_,_). 1 { assigned(C,R,D,P) : r(R) } 1 :- assigned(C,D,P).

hard_constraints.description: Compliance requires that the total number of lectures scheduled for each course matches the mandated curriculum count exactly.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: N { assigned(C,D,P) : d(D), ppd(P) } N :- course(C,_,N,_,_,_).

hard_constraints.description: Our policy dictates a strict prohibition on double-booking teachers; a teacher cannot be assigned to more than one lecture in any given period.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- not { assigned(C,D,P) : course(C,T,_,_,_,_) } 1, t(T), d(D), ppd(P).

hard_constraints.description: To maintain curriculum integrity, we must ensure that no single curriculum has overlapping lectures within the same time slot.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- not { assigned(C,D,P) : curricula(Cu,C) } 1, cu(Cu), d(D), ppd(P).

hard_constraints.description: Facility management rules require that no two lectures occupy the same physical room during the same period.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- not { assigned(C,R,D,P) : c(C) } 1, r(R), d(D), ppd(P).

hard_constraints.description: All schedules must be in full compliance with staff availability; lectures must not be assigned to periods where the teacher is unavailable.

soft_constraints.description: Room utilization policy: minimize instances where the student headcount exceeds the defined capacity of the assigned room.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("RoomCapacity",assigned(C,R,D,P),(N-Cap)*W,Prior) :- assigned(C,R,D,P), course(C,_,_,_,N,_), room(R,Cap,_), N > Cap, soft_constraint("RoomCapacity",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Academic distribution policy: ensure that course lectures are spread across the minimum required number of working days to optimize learning.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: working_day(C,D) :- assigned(C,D,P). penalty("MinWorkingDays",course(C,MWD,N),(MWD-N)*W,Prior) :- course(C,_,_,MWD,_,_), N = { working_day(C,D) }, N < MWD, soft_constraint("MinWorkingDays",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Student experience rule: lectures within a curriculum should be scheduled adjacently to avoid isolated sessions.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P) :- assigned(C,D,P), curricula(Cu,C). penalty("IsolatedLectures",isolated_lectures(Cu,D,P),W,Prior) :- scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P), not scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P-1), not scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P+1), soft_constraint("IsolatedLectures",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Time management policy: eliminate empty gaps or windows between lectures within a curriculum on the same day.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("Windows",windows(Cu,D,P1,P2),(P2-P1-1)*W,Prior) :- scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P1), scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P2), P1 + 1 < P2, not scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P) : P = P1+1..P2-1; soft_constraint("Windows",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Operational efficiency rule: minimize the movement of courses between different rooms to ensure room stability.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: using_room(C,R) :- assigned(C,R,D,P). penalty("RoomStability",using_room(C,N),(N-1)*W,Prior) :- c(C), N = { using_room(C,R) }, N > 1, soft_constraint("RoomStability",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Workload compliance: maintain the daily lecture load for each curriculum within the specified minimum and maximum thresholds.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("StudentMinMaxLoad",student_min_max_load(Cu,D,N,many),(N-Max)*W,Prior) :- cu(Cu), d(D), N = { scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P) }, min_max_daily_lectures(Min,Max), N > Max, soft_constraint("StudentMinMaxLoad",W,Prior). penalty("StudentMinMaxLoad",student_min_max_load(Cu,D,N,few),(Min-N)*W,Prior) :- cu(Cu), d(D), N = { scheduled_curricula(Cu,D,P) }, min_max_daily_lectures(Min,Max), 0 < N, N < Min, soft_constraint("StudentMinMaxLoad",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Logistics policy: consecutive lectures in a curriculum must not require students to change buildings.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("TravelDistance",instantaneous_move(Cu,C1,C2,D,P,P+1),W,Prior) :- curricula(Cu,C1), curricula(Cu,C2), assigned(C1,R1,D,P), assigned(C2,R2,D,P+1), room(R1,_,BLG1), room(R2,_,BLG2), BLG1 != BLG2, soft_constraint("TravelDistance",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Resource alignment rule: ensure courses are assigned to rooms that are specifically suited for their requirements.
Curriculum scheduling policy: courses requiring double lectures must have them scheduled as a single, contiguous block.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("DoubleLectures",non_grouped_lecture(C,R,D,P),W,Prior) :- course(C,_,_,_,_,1), d(D), 2 { assigned(C,D,PPD) }, assigned(C,R,D,P), not assigned(C,R,D,P-1), not assigned(C,R,D,P+1), soft_constraint("DoubleLectures",W,Prior).

soft_constraints.description: Optimization Goal: Minimize the total weighted penalty across all soft policy violations to achieve the most compliant schedule.
